-- Database: DemoDatabase

-- DROP DATABASE "DemoDatabase";

CREATE DATABASE "DemoDatabase"
    WITH 
    OWNER = "SuperUser"
    ENCODING = 'UTF8'
    LC_COLLATE = 'English_United States.1252'
    LC_CTYPE = 'English_United States.1252'
    TABLESPACE = pg_default
    CONNECTION LIMIT = -1;



-- Table: public.Blogposts

-- DROP TABLE public."Blogposts";

CREATE TABLE public."Blogposts"
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "Slug" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Title" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Description" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Body" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "TagList" text[] COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "CreatedAt" timestamp without time zone,
    "UpdatedAt" timestamp without time zone,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Blogposts" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public."Blogposts"
    OWNER to "SuperUser";


-- Table: public.Tags

-- DROP TABLE public."Tags";

CREATE TABLE public."Tags"
(
    "Id" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "Name" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Tags" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public."Tags"
    OWNER to "SuperUser";
